revised_title: A Detailed Study of the Exocoetus Volitans, or Flying Fish
tldr: The author provides a detailed description of the anatomy and physiology of the Exocoetus Volitans, or Flying Fish, including its unique wing structure, eye and muscle features, and digestive system. The article also discusses the fish's ability to expand its wings and the possibility of it being able to skim along the water surface during flight.
